description:
Rataleone wants to live forever! A Gypsy tells him that the sacred bezoar stone holds the secret. According to legend, the stone can only be found in the stomachs of the very rare Peruvian Vicunas. Meanwhile, Ai-Ai is depressed! No-How concludes that she needs a boyfriend and dispatches our heroes to Peru in search of the only surviving male dragon in the world. The Bamboo Bears soon learn of the Vicunas` peril, send the Bad Rats packing, discover the real secret of the bezoar stone and, indeed, find a suitor for their friend Ai-Ai!
Source: bcdb.com
